title: The 90s hit “Torn,” performed by a mime and Natalie Imbruglia [video]
content: Thank God for the internet. The internet means that televised moments like this will never be forgotten. David Armand, professional mime, is joined on stage by Natalie Imbruglia in this downright perplexing rendition of “Torn.” Full story at YouTube. More great music. Photo credit: Canva Posted by Josh Urich
